name: Shaman
description: You have attuned yourself to a spiritual realm that most people neither notice nor interact with.

exploits.name: Ghost Warrior
exploits.description: You can touch—and harm—incorporeal creatures such as spirits as though they were corporeal.

exploits.name: Speak with Spirits
exploits.description: You can see and speak to spirits. There are a surprising number of spirits inhabiting the world, and you can always find one to talk to. Once per day, you can cause a spirit to truthfully answer one yes-or-no question.

exploits.name: Spirit Animal
exploits.description: Choose an animal with a maximum dice pool equal to yours or lower. That is your spirit animal. You are able to invoke the abilities of that animal: spend two actions and gain one of that animal’s attribute scores or skills for one minute. You can take this exploit multiple times, getting a new spirit animal each time; the new one is in addition to your existing animal(s).

exploits.name: Spiritual Energy
exploits.description: You gain energy from your companion spirits, who provide you with power to cast spells. Once per day you may cast a spell you would normally be able to cast, but you do not expend the MP needed to do so.

exploits.name: Spirit Ward
exploits.description: You create a 30' diameter circle that spirits and other incorporeal creatures cannot enter. This circle stays in place until you create a new circle. You may only create one circle per day.
